tool_description: List of all countries and cities
name: City List
title: City List

api_list.name: getCity
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://city-list.p.rapidapi.com/api/getCity/iq"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "city-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://city-list.p.rapidapi.com/api/getCity/{iso}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "city-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
